items.title: A warm welcome to Arda Bariş Başaran!
items.description: Please join us in welcoming Arda Bariş Başaran to the Centre for Digital Health Interventions! Arda is a doctoral researcher at ETH Zurich, working at ADAMMA within the Center for Digital Health Interventions. His current work includes contributing to the development of a smart health [...]

items.title: 2 Full Stack Engineers (80–100%), University of Zurich: AI Agent Systems for Digital Therapeutics and Clinical Trials
items.description: The digitization of everyday life creates new opportunities for healthcare innovation. Building on more than 15 years of research in designing and evaluating digital therapeutics (DTx, software-based interventions for prevention, management, and treatment of disease), we started to work on novel DTx Design & Trial Services [...]

items.title: Davinny Sou and Marinja Principe attend Gender Medicine Winter School
items.description: CDHI Core Digital Women's Health members Davinny Sou, and Marinja Principe participated in the winter school “GenDeCT - Sex- and Gender-sensitive inclusive design of clinical trials” at Universität Bielefeld. The Winter School conveyed scientific and practical methods for closing the gender data gap in clinical trial design, [...]

items.title: CDHI at the Joint International Conference on Serious Games
items.description: Nadja Ging-Jehli, PhD (Core Director for Adaptive Intelligence and Mental Health Mechanisms at CDHI) gave an invited talk at the Joint International Conference on Serious Games, where she introduced her new platform, Gearshift Fellowship. It is a next-generation Supertask paradigm that integrates serious gaming with computational neuroscience, [...]

items.title: UMZH Precision Digital Therapeutics Summer School, 17-21 August 2026, Zurich
items.description: What are Precision Digital Therapeutics (PDTx)? How are PDTx designed, evaluated, implemented, scaled, and reimbursed? How can Generative AI make PDTx highly personalized? Digital Therapeutics (DTx) are software-based interventions to manage and treat disease. Precision DTx (PDTx) deliver hyper-personalized interventions at the most relevant and opportune moment [...]
